product_name: Snow Peak Titanium Mug with HotLips
long_description: Use the Snow Peak Titanium mug with HotLips to enjoy a steaming cup of coffee without worrying about burning your lips. Place the single-wall titanium 600 mug directly on your stove (sold separately) to heat your coffee, tea or soup and then place the HotLips on the mug and start sipping. Titanium mug with HotLips weighs only 3 oz., leaves no metallic smell or taste and will not rust; mug holds 20 fl. oz. (0.6 liter). Food-grade silicone HotLips stays cool to the touch so you won't burn your lips; silicone won't melt under normal use and is heat resistant to 446degF. Handles flip out for a secure grip and wrap around the mug for compact storage. Mug is sized to stow a Snow Peak Giga Power or LiteMax stove and a 110g fuel canister, all sold separately. Includes a small mesh storage sack. Do not leave HotLips on the mug while heating over an open flame.
